text:
@BorisJohnson England hasn't had one Day without a new COVID19 or death. I'm only listening to the NZ PM and even Nicola Sturgeon for sensible legislation about tackling this pandemic. 

You shouldn't be allowed to be left alone with a boiling kettle.
